SourceProxy.name: OGSSpatialStatsFromFile
SourceProxy.label: OGS Spatial Statistics From File

Documentation.long_help: This filter loads the spatial statistics computed by OGSTM BFM into the mesh.
Documentation.short_help: Loads the spatial statistics computed by OGSTM BFM into the mesh.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This filter requires a rectilinear grid and the basins mask active. It pulls the spatial statistics postprocess from OGSTM BFM and loads the results into the mesh.
